intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I have experience in web application development. Through my previous experiences, I have been involved in numerous projects, learning techniques and best practices to create outstanding interfaces that cater to user needs. I consistently keep an eye on emerging technology trends, aiming for continuous self-improvement and striving for further accomplishments. Looking ahead, I am eager to venture into back-end development tasks as well.
